short_summary: Bilingual Junior Level Project Manager is required for the Transport Canada Marine Safety and Security (MSS) Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) Renewal Project
description: Obtaining professional services of one Bilingual Junior Level Project Manager (Contractor A), one Bilingual Senior Technical Writer (Contractor B) and one Bilingual Intermediate Technical Writer (Contractor C) are required for the Transport Canada Marine Safety and Security (MSS) Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) Renewal Project
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Invitation to Bid: Professional Services

### Title

* English: TSPS SA Professional Services for Three Contractors
* French: SPTS AMA Services professionnels pour trois entrepreneurs

### Reference Number

*  PW-23-01028169

### Summary

Transport Canada invites bids from qualified Service Arrangement (SA) Holders to provide professional services for the implementation of the Marine Safety and Security (MSS) Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) Renewal Project. The services required include:
* One Bilingual Junior Level Project Manager
* One Bilingual Senior Technical Writer
* One Bilingual Intermediate Technical Writer

### Background

This requirement is open only to those SA Holders who are under E60ZT-18TSPS and have qualified as Tier 1 under the stated consultant category, region, and level of expertise.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes the provision of professional services to implement the key initiatives of the MSS SOP Renewal Project. This may include:
* Project management
* Technical writing
* Other related services

### Security Requirements

There are security requirements associated with this requirement, including:
* Protected B security level for the company
* Protected B security level for resources
* Protected B security level for document safeguarding

### Trade Agreements

This requirement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

###.Contract Details

* Contract duration: From Contract Award to March 31, 2024
* Estimated level of effort: 340 days
* File Number: T8080220614

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Anthony Senauth
Phone: 204-590-8905
Email: Anthony.Senauth@tc.gc.ca
